attributes.body:
A New Beginning

It had been about eight years since I had last been to Costa Rica. The last time I was in San Jose, someone had tried to mug me, so going back wasn't high on my priorities list, neither was sticking around for a while.

I discovered a fantastic place to stay with a relaxed, down to earth, and welcoming group of people at Hostel Bekuo. In any hostel you go to, the different people make a different dynamic, but there are some hostels that seem to attract a certain type of person, and this seems to be one of those places, and in a very good way. I really enjoyed my time here walking around San Jose, or staying in and cooking and talking with other folks. An easy life for a while.

I also got the insider scoop on San Jose from my new friend Ericka. She was even good enough to introduce me to her friends, and take me on a weekend trip to Puerto Viejo. I had tons of fun, and my experience in San Jose would have been much shorter and less interesting without it.

photos.title: Happy Birthday Beer
photos.description: Got to go out to dinner, and go see Ericka play some music on my birthday. Plans for departure the next morning.

photos.title: New Threads
photos.description: I found some sweet stuff in the lost and found.

photos.title: San Jose Veggie Market
photos.description: Pretty much all of the booths looked kind of like this. This was one of the prettier ones.

photos.title: Walking About
photos.description: Mateo took me on a walk to see a park and go to the market. It was a lovely day to be in San Jose.

photos.title: Volcano
photos.description: Shot a video with Walter for his class, it was fun and was a good excuse to ride up a volcano.

photos.title: Fun Folks
photos.description: Some cool folks from the hostel.

photos.title: San Jose, Downtown
photos.description: That missile is made of reused plastic bottles, and illuminated in fading colors. Very cool.

photos.title: Jenga
photos.description: Jenga: this is what winning looks like.

photos.title: Conejo
photos.description: This is Tranquis, he's a bit like a dog, except he likes to nibble your computer cables.

photos.title: Orange Juice
photos.description: This guy rolls around with this cart and makes fresh OJ on the spot. I thought it was pretty genius.

photos.title: Casado
photos.description: This is a fairly average Tico lunch.

photos.title: Dinner Time
photos.description: Not a great shot, but I made some chicken and salad I was pretty proud of. I did a lot of cooking during this period.

photos.title: Hostel Life
photos.description: The room was mostly quiet, and not a bad place to get some work done. But then at night there were usually some  billiards and beers.

photos.title: Buds
photos.description: Another dinner made. I tried something resembling ful medames...

photos.title: Gallo Pinto
photos.description: My first Gallo Pinto of the trip.
